songs.title: Ooh La La (Unreleased)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la

[Verse 1]
When the lights go down and the bass starts bumping loud
Can you feel it now?
As the sweat starts dripping down
We don't care tonight, just give in if the feeling is right
'Cause we're so animal, natural
'Cause baby you need it, I need it
Everybody needs a little

[Chorus]
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Don't try to fight it
You know you want somebody's
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Why don't you try it?
You wanna taste a little
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Birds and the bees do it
Why shouldn't we do it?
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
You need it, I need it
Everybody needs a little
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la

[Verse 2]
I don't know your name but I want you
And the look in your eyes driving me insane
So come play now, it's all part of the game
[?] down, [?]
Inhibitions, leave 'em all at the door
'Cause we're so animal, natural
'Cause baby you need it, I need it
Everybody needs a little

[Chorus]
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Don't try to fight it
You know you want somebody's
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Why don't you try it?
You wanna taste a little
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Birds and the bees do it
Why shouldn't we do it?
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
You need it, I need it
Everybody needs a little
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la

[Bridge]
Everybody, everybody, let somebody rock your body
All night, all night, 'til we see the morning light
New York, Paris, London, Rio, all around the world we rockin'
All night, all night, 'til we see the morning light
Everybody, everybody, let somebody rock your body
All night, all night, 'til we see the morning light
New York, Paris, London, Rio, all around the world we rockin'
All night, all night, 'til we see the morning light
(You need it, I need it, they need it, we need it)
(Everybody needs a little)

[Chorus]
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Don't try to fight it
You know you want somebody's
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Why don't you try it?
You wanna taste a little
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Birds and the bees do it
Why shouldn't we do it?
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
You need it, I need it
Everybody needs a little
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
Ooh, la, la, la-la-la-la
